meanings.definition: Resembling the color or texture of a carrot.
meanings.sent1: The carroty sunset painted the sky in shades of orange and red.
meanings.sent2: Her carroty scarf matched perfectly with her autumn outfit.
meanings.sent3: The carroty walls of the house made it look like a giant pumpkin!
meanings.sent4: The carroty glow of the fire warmed the room on a cold winter night.
meanings.sent5: The carroty glow of the fire made the room feel cozy and inviting.

meanings.sent1: The little girl's carroty curls bounced as she ran in the park.
meanings.sent2: His carroty hair stood out in the crowd of dark-haired people.
meanings.sent3: The carroty-haired cat looked like a tiny lion prowling in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her carroty locks flowed like a river of flames down her back.
meanings.sent5: The carroty-haired boy was easily spotted in the sea of brunettes.
